body_html:
This code can be made more efficient by communicating the the fast that speculation is acceptable to the compiler:

scalar_t weight = weight_data[j];
scalar_t input = input_data[pos];
scalar_t scaled_output = weight * input;
result_data[pos] = (input > 0) ? input : scaled_output;

You can go even farther down the rabbit hole by hoisting the computation of weight out a loop level, and by using __restrict__ and the aligned attributed as appropriate. Maybe not worth the effort.
